name: Island 42
description:
In 2018, the world succumbed to the devastating effects of climate change. Only the richest were able to secure their escape from planet earth. Forty years later, you are on of the few survivors remaining on the sparse islands: Island 42.

Created as part of https://itch.io/jam/beginners-circle-jam-3

Music by: http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com/
